name: Neon-Ninja
description:
Can you become a Neon Ninja?  It's easier said than done...

Test your reflexes and eye movement in this fast-paced, fruit ninja inspired game. Test your skills with Unicorn Sensei, or train in endless mode, the choice is yours!   

Made in a 48hr period

  • Daniel Oldham (Programmer) Portfolio: https://www.dangodev.com/
